Rule.Name: Disable Auto Deployment of Applications (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Auto deployment of applications is enabled, which may allow unauthorized applications to be deployed automatically.
Rule.Correction: sed -i '/<Context/ { /autoDeploy=/! s|<Context|<Context autoDeploy="false"|; }' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/context.xml && systemctl restart tomcat10

Rule.Name: Disable Deploy On Startup of Applications (Automated)
Rule.Section: Disable Deploy On Startup of Applications
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Deploy on startup of applications is enabled, which may allow unauthorized applications to be deployed automatically on server startup.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable deploy on startup of applications.
